header.name: Performance Boost Pack (1.21+)
header.description: Disables texture animations and supports low-res + particle-free subpacks for low-end devices.

subpacks.name: Ultra Low (8x + particles off + env off)
subpacks.description: Max perf: tiny textures, particles off, env overlays removed.

subpacks.name: Low (16x + particles off + env off)
subpacks.description: Great perf: small textures, particles off, env overlays removed.

subpacks.name: Balanced (16x + reduced particles)
subpacks.description: Balanced: conservative texture downsizing, light particle reduction.
